definition: to put together an order of goods
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: According to sales picking cabinet shop, business management training staff.
sentences.chinese: 根据店柜销售情况配货，营业员管理培训。

sentences.english: We can according to different requirements of price and rationing guests.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以按不同的价位及客人要求来配货。

sentences.english: All commodity all distribute money by Chengdu and send.
sentences.chinese: 所有商品均由成都配货并发送。

sentences.english: Our company is directly related to domestic and overseas dealers rationing.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是直接与海内外经销商配货。

sentences.english: The delivery order to your order of time distribution.
sentences.chinese: 订单的出库时间要以您订单的配货情况而定。

sentences.english: I would drop the warehouse distribution system.
sentences.chinese: 我不会和仓库配货系统打交道。

definition: to order goods/to place an order
to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to put together an order and deliver it (i.e. 配貨|配货[pei4 huo4] and 送貨|送货[song4 huo4])/to deliver (goods)
to load sth onto a ship etc
to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
variant of 訂貨|订货[ding4 huo4]
